Name: furnace production, wood chips, with silo, 300kW | furnace, wood chips, with silo, 300kW | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners
Description: Furnace of modern technology available on the European and Swiss market, with tilting grate technology and combustion chambers in refractory bricks, designed for an optimal combustion process (cyclone integrated). The model of reference is a woodchip boiler, brand Froling mod.Turbomat 320 kW. It was compared with another model with similar technology, brand Schmid mod.Pyrotronic UTSR 300 kW. Represent the typical boiler for providing heat for local heating networks, commercial premises and multi-storey housing.;Source of image: http://www.froeling.com/ch/produkte/hackgut-ab-150kw/froeling-turbomat.html
